welcome:
Hello — I'm Master First King 🔥
View your kings with /commands and set new ones by replying to a message with /setking 📝; from then on, the first person each day to write that word will become the King.

Use /top to see the rankings  🔝
For any issues @nukleolimitatibot
notreply: This command must be used in reply to another message.
nocmds:
No King set.
Use /setking in reply to a word to make it a King.
nospaces: The King command cannot contain spaces.
toolong: The King command can be at most 10 characters long.
deletecmdinfo: Are you sure to delete king:
